metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12626 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Apache POI in versions prior to release 3.17 are vulnerable to Denial ofService Attacks: 1) Infinite Loops while parsing crafted WMF, EMF, MSG andmacros (POI bugs 61338 and 61294), and 2) Out of Memory Exceptions whileparsing crafted DOC, PPT and XLS (POI bugs 52372 and 61295).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12626` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache-poi-java - 4.0.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libapache-poi-java package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.1-1').
